dead by daylight go brrrrrr

Unfortunately, this game suffers from a myriad of problems that will not be fixed anytime soon due to the inexperience of the development studio. The game is very unbalanced. Even with 600 hours in the game, I still do not have enough perks unlocked to compete against the side that is unbalanced. If you haven't already bought this, please understand: getting into Dead by Daylight is like trying to get into Rainbow Six Siege as a new player. 

Killer is very unbalanced compared to survivors. The scare factor wears off. Survivors can screw up over and over and over again and escape, but if killers make one mistake, you're guaranteed to lose the match. Being competitive requires you to unlock enough perks to equip a perk meta that works for the game, but as of over 600 hours, I still have not unlocked all of the perks. As you play, you unlock bloodpoints after each game, which you use to unlock the perks. It's very grindy. 

The survivor community is very toxic, and the development team is afraid to stand up to them. Instead, they ignore killer player concerns and pretend that everything is fine. Playing as killer does not make you feel intimidating or powerful, that's for survivors. The survivor community has permeated the official Dead by Daylight subreddit and discord servers, and there they intentionally and aggressively downplay killer player concerns regarding game balance, and argue that survivor is too hard to play when its not because they know that the devs are afraid to say no to them. The game is abundantly rife with cheaters too. As if having the balance in your favor is not enough, apparently some people need to be able to teleport and turn into the flash to enjoy this game. If you don't have a hacker on your team, you'll have a person which will rage quit the second something goes wrong in their game. 

The game is honestly only thriving because BHVR paid for licensed killers to be in the game. Don't buy this game, it's not worth your money or your time.

买了不亏

I posted a review here before when I only had about 10 or so hours but having more game time I now feel the need to comeback and make a new one. To state first I mostly play survivor and rarely ever play the killer. I decided to try to play killer to get one of my daily achievements and that's when I got the first hand experience of the new matchmaking system. Due to having a few good games on the killer I had chosen that round the game then decided that it would be a good idea to put level 18 killer against a level one, level three and two level sevens. Three of which were in a group. I of course lost that round horribly. The next game I was then put against two really low levels and two decent levels and was able to pull out at the end with four kills. What does matchmaking do for my next game? Put me with extremely high levels again. It was beyond frustrating. This game can be really fun to play but when matchmaking pulls stuff like this it makes me only want to play one part of the game. Which sucks because the few decent games I had on killer I enjoyed quite a bit.

I've had fun matches on both sides and I can honestly admit that I've been playing this game nonstop for the past couple weeks but this experience will probably put me off playing killer for awhile.
A nice game for teamplay or play with friends and have some laughs.

I love this game. But there are a few things I wish they fix or bring in.

I dont have a problem with matchmaking. Or wait times like other people do. and yes the game will glitch sometimes. But these issues are not as common for me as other people. However I wish they add more variety to this game.

That being said. im having a ton of frame drop issues. and It usually happens on PC. it does not matter if you lower the resolution or quality.  Ive tried everything to fix the frame drop issues. But its gotten to the point where its unbearable. and I have a decent PC. I shouldnt have to buy new hardware to just play though. Its a fun game but the Frame drop issues and  other  issues It has get to you after a while. 

that being said here are somethings I think they should do with the game to fix other issues.

1. Perks. after you level up to a certain points. there is no reason to play a certain survivor. On top of that you can only pick 4 perks. But sometimes Id wish they let you pick 5 perks. It would balance the game out complelty I believe. Also when you have a certain character they should give that character one ability so you have a reason to play as that survivor. Killers dont have this issue as they all have their own special skill. something I wish survivors had.

2. Why not give us the ability to hide under beds instead of just lockers? Just saying. and you can have fun with that with one of freddys abilitys.

3.there should be 5 survivors total and more gens. Sometimes people gen rush and makes that game play boring. Gen rushing is cool. But you can do it to any killer and win very easily. To any killer if your team is reliable enough.

4. Give all the killers a special kill move like P.H. why is he the only killer to have an auto kill move when you need to equip Mori's to other killers? seems a tad dumb in my opinon.

5. Pallets are fun to use but they get used over and over and over. Give us some varitey to escape the killer other than flash lights and pallents or hiding. give survivors the ability to fight back a little and stun the killer. Example - Baseball bat could stun the killer  but its hard to use and breaks if you use it enough. Easy fixes to make the game more interesting.

These are just my opinons and mine alone. I just wish they added more to this game.

Otherwise Im addicted to this game and play it frequently..
